name: Will-o-Wisp
description: A small, floating orb of light that lures travelers into dangerous areas like swamps or bogs.
memorable: It feeds on the fear and despair of victims and can control its glow, making it nearly invisible.
goals: To lure and trap lost travelers into danger for sustenance.
relations: Often found haunting graveyards, marshes, or cursed lands, leading victims to their doom.
environment: Dark and eerie locations, such as graveyards and marshes.
strengths: Incredibly fast and elusive, with high dexterity and multiple immunities.
weaknesses: Physically weak with a very low strength score.
attacks: It can deliver deadly shocks of electrical energy to those who touch it or engage it in melee.
most_powerful_ability: Conductive ability inflicts lightning damage to creatures that touch it.
senses: It has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to navigate effectively in darkness.
skills: Its high dexterity enables it to evade physical threats efficiently.
additional_information: Requires neither air, sustenance, nor sleep.
Can alter its glow to change visibility or evade detection.
Senses treasure within a considerable range of 500 feet.
Incorporeal movement allows it to pass through objects.
Can become invisible until it attacks or uses a specific ability.
test_queries: small glowing undead creature in swamps
ethereal spirit that lures travelers to danger
ghostly orb that shocks its victims
invisible creature that feeds on fear
